extendedInfo.description: The UK's only online gas bill calculator is now available on Android!!!Perfect for estimating your British Gas, Co-Op, E.On and many other suppliers bills. Simply enter both meter readings and hit calculate to get a estimation of your gas bill.The Gas Bill Calculator also gives you the option to update the specific values used to calculate your bills in the settings menu (you should be able to find all the values in the settings menu on your bill).*Tip*Don't have a tiered plan? No problem, enter the settings menu and enter the same price for both Tier One price and Tier Two price, this will ensure the pricing applied to the units you have used is the same.Can't use the app?  Don't worry, you can still head over to http://www.gasbillcalculator.com to get an estimate of your gas bill.For additional support or bug submissions, head over to http://www.365developer.com and enter details of your request in the contact form.

reviews.title: Read this if your gas meter says m3 on it:
reviews.comment: Had me confused at first because the totals it was giving me were way out after entering the stats from my gas bill. If your gas meter units are rated in m3 then make sure you change the \'Conversion Factor\' to 1. Now it\'s accurate. Would be 5 stars if the app could log a weekly or monthly meter read so I can see at a glance my weekly heating costs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says on the tin!
reviews.author: A Google User
